# Memory Leak Analyzer - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A full-stack application for analyzing memory leaks and corruption in C/C++ code using AI-powered analysis with Claude.

**Stack:**
- Frontend: React with TypeScript
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- C/C++ Analysis Engine: Native bindings via node-ffi
- AI: Claude API for intelligent analysis

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file exists
- [ ] Scaffold the project
- [ ] Customize the project
- [ ] Install required extensions
- [ ] Compile the project
- [ ] Create and run task
- [ ] Launch the project
- [ ] Ensure documentation is complete

## Key Features to Implement
1. File upload and parsing (binary, source code)
2. Memory analysis using C/C++ tools
3. Claude AI integration for leak detection and analysis
4. Real-time visualization of memory issues
5. Report generation

## Development Environment
- Node.js 18+
- Python 3.8+ (for C/C++ build tools)
- CMake 3.15+
- Xcode Command Line Tools (macOS)
